## Helia interface

The API presented by a Helia node.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Helia<T = Libp2p> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [blockstore](./interface.helia.blockstore.md) |  | Blocks | Where the blocks are stored |
|  [datastore](./interface.helia.datastore.md) |  | Datastore | A key/value store |
|  [gc](./interface.helia.gc.md) |  | (options?: [GCOptions](./interface.gcoptions.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt; | Remove any unpinned blocks from the blockstore |
|  [libp2p](./interface.helia.libp2p.md) |  | T | The underlying libp2p node |
|  [pins](./interface.helia.pins.md) |  | Pins | Pinning operations for blocks in the blockstore |
|  [start](./interface.helia.start.md) |  | () =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt; | Starts the Helia node |
|  [stop](./interface.helia.stop.md) |  | () =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt; | Stops the Helia node |
